sentence: The  Hamas  attackers  killed  at  least  1,300  people  in  Israel  and  returned  to  Gaza  with  an  estimated  150  hostages.

The  Palestinian  Health  Ministry  says  Israel's  ensuing  bombardment  in  the  territory  has  killed  more  than  1,500  Palestinians  and  wounded  thousands  more  who  now  require  medical  attention.
